atm

Class ATM

  • java.lang.Object
    • atm.ATM
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ATM
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents an ATM machine.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getUser

        public User getUser(java.lang.String username)
        Returns a user if they are recognized by the ATM.
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the person trying to use the ATM
        Returns:
        the verified User

      • run

        public void run()
        Reboots the ATM. Every time the ATM is rebooted, all stocks, mutual funds and subscriptions are updated with the newest prices. Furthermore, it checks adds interest to savings every month. Every time the ATM is run, the login menu will be displayed. If the ATM is run for the first time, then the only two people that are allowed to log in are Bank Manager and Broker with the usernames "manager" and "broker" and passwords "password" and "password," respectively.

      • addSavingsInterest

        private void addSavingsInterest()
        Adds the specified interestRate to the balances of all savings account at the beginning of each month.
        See Also:
        Savings

      • setDate

        public void setDate(java.lang.String sdfFormattedDate)
        Sets the date of the ATM machine for dates specific demoing purposes.
        Parameters:
        sdfFormattedDate - a string that is formatted in "YYYY-MM-DD" where YYYY is the year, MM is the month and DD is the date.

      • addUserToList

        public void addUserToList(User u)
        Adds a new user to the list of users who can use the ATM.
        Parameters:
        u - the new user to add to the ATM's list of recognized users

      • shutDown

        public void shutDown()
        Shuts down the ATM. Uses serialization to store the current state of the ATM machine.

      • writeObject

        private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Used to serialize the ATM object.
        Parameters:
        oos - instance of the ObjectOutputStream class to write the ATM object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.

      • readObject

        private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream ois)
                 throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Used in serialization to restore the ATM's state after it reboots.
        Parameters:
        ois - instance of the ObjectInputStream class used to deserialize the ATM object
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class of the serialized object could not be found
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs

      • readObjectNoData

        private void readObjectNoData()
                       throws java.io.ObjectStreamException
        Used in serialization when class inheritance is not as expected*
        Throws:
        java.io.ObjectStreamException - when an attempt to deserialize a back-reference fails.
